title: Release Of 6000 Inmates By DOJ A Good Start, But Still Isn't Enough
text:
Pete Miesel • 1 min ago 
Hell, the Nazi party was routinely killing political opponents before Hitler was even invited to be part of the German government. posted on Ben Carson Blames Gun Control For The Holocaust TellMeImDreaming • 1 min ago 
The Gun must have it's sacrifices. Just not laid on a altar, but on the morgue's autopsy tables.... Find the Truth • 1 min ago 
"Man, Jeb is one ignorant SOB, the CONSTITUTION lays out the federal role in elections CLEARLY... 
Article One, Section 4 
"The times, places and manner of holding elections for Senators and Representatives, shall be prescribed in each state by the legislature thereof; BUT THE CONGRESS MAY AT ANY TIME BY LAW MAKE OR ALTER SUCH REGULATIONS,"
